name: Whirlwind: A Live Dance Performance
description:
An improvised dance, shot, performed, and edited in real-time with dancers from around the world in India, Spain, and Canada. A live dance that's unfiltered, unmediated, unrepeatable, and materialises in the moment.

The piece reflects the struggles of love and staying true to ones self.  

Created by Beets.

Original song by Aston Archer.

Lyrics
It started out like a whirlwind of emotion 
we played like we were children 
and then it all changed, we became ourselves 
fell in love all over again

From the start, I knew it was you 
I felt somethings, it was different 
And nothing has changed, I feel the same
like a whirlwind of emotion. 

And I wont step away 
from the life we both spent time to make 
it makes my heart beat so fast I can't sleep 
sometimes
it just feels like a whirlwind of emotion
